ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_12_22.shtml: new zmap release notes for 22 December 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_12_22.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 22/12/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.12678/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h, zmapConfig/zmapConfigLoader.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyleUtils.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyle_I.h, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCollectionFeature.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowGlyphItem.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowGlyphItem.h: added slash glyphs and style config options
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureData.c: corrected rather obvious cut and paste error on line 64 - GRAPH mode set as GLYPH
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCollectionFeature.c: default for homology glyphs as previous hard coded values fixef temporarily
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h, zmapConfig/zmapConfigLoader.c, zmapDraw/zmapDraw.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyle_I.h, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowBasicFeature.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCollectionFeature.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowGlyphItem.c: free glyphs now work w/ styles config w/ outline and fill colours and glyph type; default fill colour broken mysteriously
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowBasicFeature.c, zmapWindowGlyphItem.c: changed glyph set color to use GdkColor as per code usage
  • src/zmapThreads/zmapThreadsUtils.c: replace CLK_TCK macro with CLOCKS_PER_SEC which is new POSIX.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix pasting of transcript exon coords into selection buffer.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: homol sets must now be hashed to include the match strand, also partial fix to undoing colinear markers.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: fix bug in exon/intron output (missing match strand), fix permissions for tmp dir and files.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowItem.c: fix highlighting for shift-click to just highlight a single exon.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix compiler warning for missing cast.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowCanvasItem.c, zmapWindowCanvasItem.h: fix highlighting of sub-parts of an object.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem_I.h: tidy up some comments etc.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapServerProtocol.h, zmapServer/zmapServer.c, zmapServer/zmapServer.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/zmapServerPrototype.h, zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c, zmapServer/das/dasServer.c, zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: get the source data struct returned to view.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapXRemote.h: add code for failed command.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapXRemoteUtils.c: add failed command code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: retrieve source data info, e.g. suorce style.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add look up of feature style from source data info., add better error handling for feature create.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView_P.h: add source data hash to view state.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: removed memory leak on colbumprange
